bioghist.p: Dr. Joseph S. Schmuckler, is a professor of Chemistry and Science Education in the Graduate School of Temple University. He has received many awards and citations for his contributions to chemical education, including Outstanding Science Teacher in the State of Pennsylvania in 1963 and 1967.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of materials relating to the Chemical Education Material Study (CHEM Study), a project undertaken to develop a new chemistry curriculum for use in high schools. The collection includes: achievement tests, teacher's guides, multiple copies of printed teacher resource guides from the Advisory Council on College Chemistry, trial editions of CHEM Study textbooks and laboratory manuals, published 1967 editions of CHEM Study textbook and laboratory manual, copies of textbooks prepared by the Chemical Bond Approach (CBA) project, a history of the project entitled "The CHEM Study Story," by Merrill and Ridgway, CHEM Study newsletters from 1960 to 1969, brochures relating to CHEM Study films, and miscellaneous other CHEM Study records.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
